revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=WPJ342 |revision=LV |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/01/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless embedded board |fcc_id=TK4WPJ342 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12-24 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9342 |cpu1_cspeed=560 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6405D |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6KB-25 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=1 |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header |serial=yes,, 4-pin header |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9342 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model=AR8236 |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;;CompexWRT; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=an |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''5GHz 2Ã—2 Wireless Embedded Board with MiniPCI-e Slot'''
{{ProductPage|http://www.compex.com.sg/product/wpj342/}} :[http://www.compex.com.sg/datasheets/PCBA-WPJ342-BB_DSv1.0.0.pdf Datasheet]
Per '''Compex''''s datasheet... *"C-432JPW 7A03" is silkscreened on the board shown *It seems to be indicated that there are (or will be) two item codes for the device.. :one for a low voltage (12-24V PoE) and one for a high voltage model (36-48V PoE) :DC jack input is noted as 12-24V for both boards *'''CompexWRT''' is noted as the stock OS - it seems to be derived from '''OpenWrt''' *'''OpenWrt''' is (or will be, if not now) supported on these boards
[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/compex/wpj342 ''WPJ342'' on '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]
===See also=== *[[Compex MML342]] - [http://www.compex.com.sg/product/mml342/ PPage] *[[Compex MMJ342]] - [http://www.compex.com.sg/product/mmj344/ PPage] *[[Compex MMJ342 Plus]] - [http://www.compex.com.sg/product/mmj342-plus/ PPage] *[[Compex WPJ344]] - TK4WPJ344 (08/22/2014) [http://www.compex.com.sg/product/wpj344/ PPage] *[[Compex WPJ531]] - TK4WPJ531 (07/24/2015) [http://www.compex.com.sg/product/wpj531/ PPage]
